transcript: Think about the people in Kansas, they had to get plane tickets and hotel reservations to see this. We live 40 minutes away. It's too good to pass up.

segments.text: Think about the people in Kansas, they had to get plane tickets and hotel reservations to see this.
We live 40 minutes away. It's too good to pass up.
